FuncDef: This command applies a queue group redirect list to the ingress or egress of an interface SAP within a VPRN service. The redirect list is used to redirect traffic to different instances of the default queue group.This command requires the prior configuration of a default queue group instance, which is the queue group instance specified with the QoS policy under the SAP ingress or egress.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the name of the queue group redirect list, up to 32 characters in length.
